summary:
Juventus, or Juve, is an Italian football club based in Turin. Founded in 1897, it's Italy's most successful club, winning many titles. They are nicknamed "the Old Lady" and have a large fan base.

The team has won 36 league titles, 15 Coppa Italia, and 9 Italian Super Cups. In Europe, they've won the UEFA Champions League twice and other major trophies. Juventus has had legendary players like Michel Platini and Paolo Rossi, winning several individual awards.

The club is known for its anticampanilismo, or non-local fan support, symbolizing national unity.
title: Juventus FC
